Valve just dropped an update that brings official SteamOS support to third-party handhelds like the ROG Ally and Legion Go. Linus and Luke get hyped about the potential for Linux-based gaming systems, the impact on Windows, and how real competition could shake up the handheld PC space.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FEy9tgyCZiY

title: SteamOS is finally on other handhelds!

Linus and Luke react to two landmark rulings from Germany: one forcing Netflix to refund a user for sneaky price hikes, and another targeting deceptive cookie consent banners. They discuss what it means for user rights and how these decisions could ripple across tech companies globally.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FEy9tgyCZiY

title: Germany protects consumers
